name: mega-anchor
effect: Unused.  This is Archie's Key Stone in Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire, but it cannot be obtained by the player.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
This anchor contains an untold power that
somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone
to Mega Evolve in battle.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
This anchor contains an untold power that
somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone
to Mega Evolve in battle.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
This anchor contains an untold power that
somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone

somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone
